wikipedia_page.main: James Brown Meunier (1885 – 30 September 1957) was an English cricketer and footballer who played first-class cricket in two matches for Warwickshire in 1920 and association football for several teams in the Football League.

response: * James Meunier (1885 in Poynton – 1957), played first-class cricket and association football for several Football League teams
